name: Architecture
description: Starting its journey in the year 1965, this is one of the premier institutions of Architecture in India. It is part of Faculty of Engineering and Technology in Jadavpur University. It offers B.Arch, M.Arch (in Urban Design) and Ph.D. degree courses. Several illustrious teachers and visiting professionals of international repute are the strength of the department. The alumni are serving the profession and academics throughout the world. The department also carries out research activities in several emergent areas.
